Bash(# Move core OBS agent files to src/obs_agent
mv obs_agent.py src/obs_agent/
mv advanced_features.py src/obs_agent/

# Move CrewAI files to src/crew
mv obs_crew_agents.py src/crew/
mv obs_crew_tools.py src/crew/
mv obs_crew_examples.py src/crew/

# Move AI agent to src/tools
mv obs_ai_agent.py src/tools/

# Move examples to examples directory
mv examples.py examples/
mv automation_scripts.py examples/
mv awesome_demo.py examples/demos/
mv demo.py examples/demos/
mv run_demo.py examples/demos/

# Move tests to tests directory
mv test_connection.py tests/
mv test_interactive.py tests/
mv test_now.py tests/
mv simple_test.py tests/

# Move documentation
mv OBS_SETUP_GUIDE.md docs/
mv README_CREW.md docs/

# Clean up root by removing old README
rm README.md)
